name: Plastic Soup
description:
We are Team 6! We made a game called Plastic Soup! In this game you are a new employee at the Plastic Soup restaurant! 

Controls:

WASD - move around
Mouse - look around/ click to continue dialogue 
E - interact with objects

Explanation how to download and play:

Open the Zip file and extract it somewhere. Then open the Folder PlasticSoup_V2 and open  "PlasticSoupPrototype" to open and play the game! 

Made by Team 6:

Cameron - Game Developer
Joëlle - UI Designer
Misha - Researcher
Showie - Game Artist
Tommy - Game Developer
Yara - Game Artist
